lines.text: I can't trust any of you.
They're all liars. You're the only one I can trust. I can trust you.
[he picks up a stick and throws it]
Fetch that! Dog! No! In the mouth, if you're a dog. In the mouth, if you're a dog. In the mouth!
[he laughs as Vadim brings him the stick held in his mouth]

[he throws the stick again]
Fetch it! Fetch it! In the mouth.
[he whistles as if calling a dog]
